00021 enum AXIS_LOCATION {
00022         AXIS_LEFT = 1,
00023         AXIS_RIGHT,
00024         AXIS_TOP,
00025         AXIS_BOTTOM,
00026 };

00055 class WXDLLIMPEXP_FREECHART Axis : public wxObject, public Observable<AxisObserver>//, public RefObject
00056 {
00057         DECLARE_CLASS(Axis)
00058 
00059         friend class Plot;
00060         friend class AxisShare;
00061 public:
00066         Axis(AXIS_LOCATION location);
00067         virtual ~Axis();
00068 
00073         AXIS_LOCATION GetLocation()
00074         {
00075                 return m_location;
00076         }
00077 
00082         bool IsVertical()
00083         {
00084                 return (m_location == AXIS_LEFT) || (m_location == AXIS_RIGHT);
00085         }
00086 
00091         bool IsHorizontal()
00092         {
00093                 return !IsVertical();
00094         }
00095 
00102         void SetMargins(wxCoord marginMin, wxCoord marginMax);
00103 
00104         //
00105         // Dataset functions.
00106         //
00111         size_t GetDatasetCount();
00112 
00118         Dataset *GetDataset(size_t index);
00119 
00120         //
00121         // Window functions.
00122         //
00123 
00128         void SetWindowWidth(double winWidth)
00129         {
00130                 SetWindow(m_winPos, winWidth);
00131         }
00132 
00137         double GetWindowWidth()
00138         {
00139                 return m_winWidth;
00140         }
00141 
00146         void SetWindowPosition(double winPos)
00147         {
00148                 SetWindow(winPos, m_winWidth);
00149         }
00150 
00155         double GetWindowPosition()
00156         {
00157                 return m_winPos;
00158         }
00159 
00164         void SetUseWindow(bool useWin)
00165         {
00166                 if (m_useWin != useWin) {
00167                         m_useWin = useWin;
00168                         FireAxisChanged();
00169                 }
00170         }
00171 
00177         void SetWindow(double winPos, double winWidth)
00178         {
00179                 if (m_winPos != winPos || m_winWidth != winWidth) {
00180                         m_winPos = winPos;
00181                         m_winWidth = winWidth;
00182                         FireAxisChanged();
00183                 }
00184         }
00185 
00192         bool IntersectsWindow(double v0, double v1);
00193 
00200         void GetWindowBounds(double &winMin, double &winMax)
00201         {
00202                 double minValue, maxValue;
00203                 GetDataBounds(minValue, maxValue);
00204 
00205                 if (m_useWin) {
00206                         winMin = m_winPos;
00207                         winMax = wxMin(maxValue, winMin + m_winWidth);
00208                 }
00209                 else {
00210                         winMin = minValue;
00211                         winMax = maxValue;
00212                 }
00213         }
00214 
00218         void AddDataset(Dataset *dataset)
00219         {
00220                 if (AcceptDataset(dataset)) {
00221                         m_datasets.Add(dataset);
00222                 }
00223         }
00224 
00230         virtual void GetDataBounds(double &minValue, double &maxValue) = 0;
00231 
00238         virtual wxCoord GetExtent(wxDC &dc) = 0;
00239 
00245         virtual bool IsVisible(double value);
00246 
00252         virtual double BoundValue(double value);
00253 
00262         virtual wxCoord ToGraphics(wxDC &dc, int minCoord, int gRange, double value);
00263 
00272         virtual double ToData(wxDC &dc, int minCoord, int gRange, wxCoord g);
00273 
00277         virtual void UpdateBounds() = 0;
00278 
00284         virtual void Draw(wxDC &dc, wxRect rc) = 0;
00285 
00291         virtual void DrawGridLines(wxDC &dc, wxRect rcData) = 0;
00292 
00293 protected:
00301         virtual bool AcceptDataset(Dataset *dataset) = 0;
00302 
00303         DatasetArray m_datasets;
00304         wxPen m_gridLinesPen;
00305 
00306         wxCoord m_marginMin;
00307         wxCoord m_marginMax;
00308 
00309         double m_winPos;
00310         double m_winWidth;
00311         bool m_useWin;
00312 
00313         FIRE_WITH_THIS(AxisChanged);
00314         FIRE_WITH_THIS(BoundsChanged);
00315

00317         AXIS_LOCATION m_location;
